markdownRemark.html: Bilingual private school from preschool to 18 years, curriculum based on the Spanish English education system, boarding facilities available. The school follows an International Curriculum (for children from 2 to 18 years old), which covers not only work programs, objectives and competences, but also promotes Cross Cultural Activities , pedagogical innovation and training.

frontmatter.title: El Centro Ingles

frontmatter.address: Av. de Fuentebravía, Km, 1, 11500 El Puerto de Sta María, Cádiz
